body:
Marco is a friend and colleague I greatly respect. We’re both the sons of immigrants who escaped Cuba to build a better life in the United States, and we share a deep appreciation and understanding of what it means to work hard and achieve the American dream.”

— Senator Ted Cruz of Texas, welcoming Senator Marco Rubio of Florida into the field of Republicans running for president and calling him a  “strong addition” who will elevate the debate.
description: Senator Ted Cruz of Texas, who announced last week, welcomed Senator Marco Rubio of Florida into the race for the Republican presidential nomination.
title: First Draft: Verbatim: Cruz Welcomes Rubio to Republican Field
